ygData.subject: RE: Kelin's lute and small brass trumpet
ygData.msgSnippet: There is the bard at the NK wiz spires - Cordelia (does not answer hails) and another in the Hogcaller s Tavern in West Freeport (gets killed by evils a lot).
ygData.messageBody:
There is the bard at the NK wiz spires - Cordelia (does not answer hails)
and another in the Hogcaller's Tavern in West Freeport (gets killed by evils
a lot). Hehe, check out the bard in the tavern in East Freeport - he has a
sword in one hand and a lute in the other. The bard - Misty Storyswapper
at the tent in West Karana near Qey Hills zone (and she patrols Qey Hills?)
- she talks of Guard McCluskey - maybe she talks more. Maybe you have to
swap a story with her?

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4
[mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 12, 2000 4:52 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Kelin's lute and small brass
trumpet

From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4"
<g4mntofcr@...>

Also, other than bard NPCs in the three guilds and the bard
messengers
posted in or near all the city zones, what other bard NPCs
are there in the
game?
